Text: For those who were interested, this recording was done (cheaply) by the band by placing 2 mikes on either side of the stage - in the back - to create a stereo mix.  Hopefully, we'll get something closer to a live studio recording of this set someday, but in the meantime...
Can somone please seed this, I am am stuck at 36.8% with several other people. Many thanks, Malc.
